name: Walking Sim PS1 Edition
description:
This is my very first game. It is incredibly basic and pretty much a walking simulator with no goal in mind. 

Its a low poly ps1 Eqsue style walking simulator There is a day and night cycle a day is about 5 minutes long. Its hopefully gonna be a fully fledged survival game. The idea is you have to survive by getting food and water with flying robotic machines flying around trying to kill you.

Controls

WASD to move

Left shift to run

Ctrl to crouch

Space bar to jump

F key to toggle flashlight

Hope you enjoy
